name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Hector M. SANTIAGO, Appellant

judges: Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, POMEROY, NIX and LARSEN, JJ.
ROBERTS and MANDERINO, JJ., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Hector M. SANTIAGO, Appellant.

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM:
Judgment of Sentence affirmed.
ROBERTS and MANDERINO, JJ., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: David H. Weinstein, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Edward G. Rendell, Dist. Atty., Steven H. Goldblatt, Deputy Dist. Atty. for Law, Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Adrian DiLuzio, Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
385 A.2d 974
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Hector M. SANTIAGO, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued April 12, 1978.
Decided May 15, 1978.
David H. Weinstein, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Edward G. Rendell, Dist. Atty., Steven H. Goldblatt, Deputy Dist. Atty. for Law, Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Adrian DiLuzio, Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellee.
Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, POMEROY, NIX and LARSEN, JJ.
